posts.title: New title 3
posts.description: The substring() method extracts the characters from a string, between two specified indices, and returns the new sub string.This method extracts the characters in a string between start and end, not including end itself.If start is greater than end, this method will swap the two arguments, meaning str.substring(1, 4) == str.substring(4, 1).If either start or end is less than 0, it is treated as if it were 0.Note: The substring() method does not change the original string.
